If you’ve recently purchased Apple hardware that includes a 12-month, 6-month, or 3-month or other complimentary free trial of Apple TV+, this offer will automatically appear in the Apple TV app when signed in with the Apple ID associated with your recent hardware purchase.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.CanIGetAtvPlusFree.Answer.AppleAccount":"There are a few ways to try Apple TV+ for free. First, try 7 days of Apple TV+ for free by starting a trial in the Apple TV app on your iPhone, iPad, Apple TV 4K or HD, or on any streaming device. Apple TV+ lets you share your subscription with up to five family members.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.CanIShareAtvPlusWithMyFamily.Question":"Can I share Apple TV+ with my family?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.CanIWatchAtvPlusPhone.Answer":"Apple TV+ is a streaming service that lives inside the Apple TV app—an app that brings Apple TV+ together with \\u003ca @@attrs1@@ href=@@link1@@ target=_blank\\u003eother streaming service subscriptions that you add\\u003c/a\\u003e. You can find the \\u003ca @@attrs2@@ href=@@link2@@ target=_blank\\u003eApple TV app on iPhone, iPad, Apple TV 4K or HD\\u003c/a\\u003e, plus on many streaming devices and smart TVs like \\u003ca @@attrs3@@ href=@@link3@@ target=_blank\\u003eRoku, Samsung, LG, Panasonic, and more\\u003c/a\\u003e.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.CanIWatchAtvPlusPhone.Answer.Link1":"https://support.apple.com/HT209670","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.CanIWatchAtvPlusPhone.Answer.Link2":"https://support.apple.com/guide/tvplus/apd5a38547d1/1.0/web/1.0","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.CanIWatchAtvPlusPhone.Answer.Link3":"https://support.apple.com/guide/tvplus/apda10aaed81/1.0/web/1.0","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.CanIWatchAtvPlusPhone.Question":"Can I watch Apple TV+ on my phone?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowDoIGetAtvPlus.Answer":"You can subscribe to Apple TV+ inside the Apple TV app on your \\u003ca @@attrs1@@ href=@@link1@@ target=_blank\\u003emobile or living room device\\u003c/a\\u003e or on \\u003ca @@attrs2@@ href=@@link2@@\\u003etv.apple.com\\u003c/a\\u003e. Your subscription to Apple TV+ will use the payment method associated with your Apple ID, which is your one sign-in for all things Apple. With one Apple account, it’s easy to \\u003ca @@attrs3@@ href=@@link3@@ target=_blank\\u003emanage your subscription in Settings\\u003c/a\\u003e on any device or on \\u003ca @@attrs2@@ href=@@link2@@\\u003etv.apple.com\\u003c/a\\u003e.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowDoIGetAtvPlus.Answer.Link1":"https://support.apple.com/guide/tvplus/welcome/web","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowDoIGetAtvPlus.Answer.Link2":"https://tv.apple.com/","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowDoIGetAtvPlus.Answer.Link3":"https://support.apple.com/HT204939","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowDoIGetAtvPlus.Question":"How do I get Apple TV+?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowMuchDoesAtvPlusCost.Answer":"Pricing might vary depending on the offer you choose. (1) If you buy an Apple device, Apple TV+ is included free for 3 months.\\u003ca @@attrs1@@ href=@@link1@@\\u003e\\u003csup\\u003e1\\u003c/sup\\u003e\\u003c/a\\u003e (2) A monthly subscription is just @@tvPlusMonthlyPrice@@ per month after a free seven-day trial.\\u003ca @@attrs2@@ href=@@link2@@\\u003e\\u003csup\\u003e2\\u003c/sup\\u003e\\u003c/a\\u003e (3) Apple TV+ is included in \\u003ca @@attrs3@@ href=@@link3@@ target=_blank\\u003eApple One\\u003c/a\\u003e, which bundles up to five other Apple services into a single monthly subscription. (4) The Apple Music Student Plan comes with a free subscription to Apple TV+.\\u003ca @@attrs4@@ href=@@link4@@\\u003e\\u003csup\\u003e3\\u003c/sup\\u003e\\u003c/a\\u003e","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowMuchDoesAtvPlusCost.Answer.Link1":"https://www.apple.com/apple-tv-plus/#footnote-2","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowMuchDoesAtvPlusCost.Answer.Link2":"https://www.apple.com/apple-tv-plus/#footnote-3","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowMuchDoesAtvPlusCost.Answer.Link3":"https://www.apple.com/apple-one/","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowMuchDoesAtvPlusCost.Answer.Link4":"https://www.apple.com/apple-tv-plus/#footnote-4","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowMuchDoesAtvPlusCost.NoTrial.Answer":"Pricing might vary depending on the offer you choose. (1) If you buy an Apple device, Apple TV+ is included free for 3 months.\\u003ca @@attrs1@@ href=@@link1@@\\u003e\\u003csup\\u003e1\\u003c/sup\\u003e\\u003c/a\\u003e (2) A monthly subscription is just @@tvPlusMonthlyPrice@@ per month. (3) Apple TV+ is included in \\u003ca @@attrs3@@ href=@@link3@@ target=_blank\\u003eApple One\\u003c/a\\u003e, which bundles up to five other Apple services into a single monthly subscription.\\u003ca @@attrs2@@ href=@@link2@@\\u003e\\u003csup\\u003e2\\u003c/sup\\u003e\\u003c/a\\u003e (4) The Apple Music Student Plan comes with a free subscription to Apple TV+.\\u003ca @@attrs3@@ href=@@link3@@\\u003e\\u003csup\\u003e3\\u003c/sup\\u003e\\u003c/a\\u003e","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowMuchDoesAtvPlusCost.Question":"How much does Apple TV+ cost?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowToCancelAtvPlus.Answer":"The easiest way to cancel an Apple TV+ subscription is to go to Settings on an Apple device like an iPhone. Open the app, choose your name, then select Subscriptions and choose Apple TV+. You can also manage your Apple TV+ subscription at \\u003ca @@attrs@@ href=@@link@@\\u003etv.apple.com\\u003c/a\\u003e. Sign in and choose the account icon in the top right corner.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowToCancelAtvPlus.Answer.Link":"https://tv.apple.com/","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowToCancelAtvPlus.Question":"How do I cancel Apple TV+?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowToShareWithFamily.Answer":"Sharing Apple TV+ through the Apple TV app uses Family Sharing, Apple’s system that helps you to share multiple Apple Services through your Apple ID. First, you need to \\u003ca @@attrs@@ href=@@link@@\\u003eset up family sharing on an Apple device\\u003c/a\\u003e, then you will be able to share Apple TV+ with your family group.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowToShareWithFamily.Answer.Link":"https://support.apple.com/HT201088","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowToShareWithFamily.Question":"How do I share Apple TV+ with my family?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowToWatchAtvPlusOnAndroidOrWindows.Answer":"The easiest way to watch Apple TV+ on an Android phone or Windows device is to visit \\u003ca @@attrs@@ href=@@link@@\\u003etv.apple.com\\u003c/a\\u003e. There, you can still sign in with an Apple ID, add Apple Original shows and movies to your Up Next watchlist, and keep track of what you're watching.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowToWatchAtvPlusOnAndroidOrWindows.Answer.Link":"https://tv.apple.com/","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.HowToWatchAtvPlusOnAndroidOrWindows.Question":"How to watch Apple TV+ on Android or Windows?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.IsAtvPlusAccessible.Answer":"Apple TV+ is part of the Apple TV app, which includes many accessibility features—so you only have to focus on enjoying Apple Original shows and movies. All Apple Originals support Closed Captions and SDH (subtitles for the Deaf and Hard of Hearing) in addition to audio descriptions; plus the entire app supports VoiceOver, Apple’s built-in screenreader. Bold Text, Increase Contrast, and Reduce Motion settings are also available. Subtitles are supported for 40+ languages for all Apple TV+ titles. \\u003ca @@attrs@@ href=@@link@@ target=_blank\\u003eLearn about more accessibility options in the Apple TV app.\\u003c/a\\u003e","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.IsAtvPlusAccessible.Answer.Link":"https://support.apple.com/guide/tvapp/accessibility-features-atvbaeff85db/web","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.IsAtvPlusAccessible.Question":"Is Apple TV+ accessible?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.MLS.AreThereDiscounts.Answer":"Apple TV+ subscribers can get MLS Season Pass for @@monthlyPrice@@ per month or @@seasonPrice@@ for the entire season. If you have T-Mobile, you might be eligible for a free annual subscription. You can contact your carrier for more information about this offer.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.MLS.AreThereDiscounts.Question":"Are there any discounts to MLS Season Pass?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.MLS.DoINeedAppleTvPlusForMLS.Answer":"No. But if you subscribe to Apple TV+, you'll receive a discount on the monthly or seasonal plan for MLS Season Pass.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.MLS.DoINeedAppleTvPlusForMLS.Question":"Do I need an Apple TV+ subscription to watch MLS matches?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.MLS.HowCanIWatchLionelMessiOnMLS.Answer":"You can watch Messi and every Inter Miami CF match with a subscription to MLS Season Pass. To sign up, create a free Apple ID. Answers.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatCanIWatchOnAtvPlus.Answer":"More Apple Original series are being added to the TV app frequently, so check back often to discover new TV shows on Apple TV+. You'll find hits like the Emmy-winning Ted Lasso, critically-acclaimed The Morning Show, and sci-fi epic Foundation, plus new and popular shows like Severance, Slow Horses, and WeCrashed.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatCanIWatchOnAtvPlus.Answer.Link":"https://tv.apple.com/","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatCanIWatchOnAtvPlus.Question":"What can I watch on Apple TV+?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatDoesAtvPlusInclude.Answer":"Apple TV+ includes Apple Original films and series—which are original shows and movies made exclusively for Apple. It also includes free access for anyone to watch Friday Night Baseball, provided through Apple TV+ in partnership with MLB (Major League Baseball). New shows and movies are being added to the streaming service often, so browse inside the Apple TV app or visit \\u003ca @@attrs@@ href=@@link@@\\u003etv.apple.com\\u003c/a\\u003e often to see new releases.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatDoesAtvPlusInclude.Answer.Link":"https://tv.apple.com/","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatDoesAtvPlusInclude.Question":"What does Apple TV+ include?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatIsAtvPlus.Answer":"Apple TV+ is a streaming service from Apple. It features exclusive Apple Original shows and movies from some of the industry's top talent, with new premieres arriving each month. Browse all of the available content on Apple TV+ inside the Apple TV app on the “Apple TV+” tab or here on \\u003ca @@attrs@@ href=@@link@@\\u003etv.apple.com\\u003c/a\\u003e.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatIsAtvPlus.Answer.Link":"https://tv.apple.com/","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatIsAtvPlus.Question":"What is Apple TV+?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatMoviesAtvPlus.Answer":"There are many movies to choose from on Apple TV+ and new Apple Original films are being added frequently. The best way to see what movies are on Apple TV+ is to browse the Apple TV+ tab inside the Apple TV app or here on \\u003ca @@attrs@@ href=@@link@@\\u003etv.apple.com\\u003c/a\\u003e. You'll find many award-winning films to choose from, like Academy Award-winner for Best Picture CODA or the critically-acclaimed The Tragedy of Macbeth. Or choose from hits like Greyhound, Swan Song, Wolfwalkers, and more.","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatMoviesAtvPlus.Answer.Link":"https://tv.apple.com/","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatMoviesAtvPlus.Question":"What movies are on Apple TV+?","WTA.LandingPage.FAQ.WhatShowsAndMoviesCanIWatchOnAtvPlus.Answer":"With Apple TV+, you can watch Apple Original shows and movies made exclusively for Apple. New releases are added each month that you can browse in the Apple TV app or on \\u003ca @@attrs@@ href=@@link@@\\u003etv.apple.com\\u003c/a\\u003e. You'll find hits like the Emmy-winning show Ted Lasso, critically acclaimed series The Morning Show, and dark comedies like Bad Sisters. Canadian-American actor Ryan Reynolds became known for playing a wide variety of roles, from snarky wiseguys in films like \\"Van Wilder\\" and \\"Waiting \\" to demanding action roles in the comic book movies \\"Green Lantern\\" (2011) and \\"Deadpool\\" (2016). Born and raised in Vancouver, British Columbia, Reynolds' first professional TV acting job came when he was 15. He was cast on the Canadian teen drama series \\"Hillside\\" (YTV/Nickelodeon, 1991-93), which was called \\"Fifteen\\" in America, and appeared on 13 episodes of the series. From there Reynolds honed his acting chops by working regularly with TV guest spots, as well as parts in made-for-TV movies like \\"A Secret Between Friends: A Moment of Truth\\" (NBC, 1996). Then in 1998 Reynolds nabbed his first big role when he was cast on the sitcom \\"Two Guys and a Girl\\" (ABC, 1998-2001). The series ran for four seasons on ABC, and despite a loyal following of fans, was cancelled in 2001 due to low ratings. Despite the cancellation of \\"Two Guys and a Girl,\\" Reynolds continued landing acting work. He played the title character in the 2002 college comedy \\"Van Wilder,\\" a foul-mouthed waiter in the 2005 restaurant comedy \\"Waiting \\" (2005), and also starred in the 2005 remake of the classic horror film, \\"The Amityville Horror\\" (2005). Ever the versatile actor, by the late 2000s Reynolds was earning praise for appearing in a wide variety of film genres, including romantic comedies (2009's \\"The Proposal\\"), comic book movies (\\"The Green Lantern\\"), and serious dramas (2015's \\" Woman in Gold\\"). Having already established himself as an A-lister with the chops to play just about any part, Reynolds' career hit an even higher point in 2016 when he played the wisecracking title character \\"Deadpool\\" (2016). \\"Deadpool\\" was a huge success at the box office, with Reynolds earning heaps of critical praise for his one-of-a-kind performance. The film was such a success that Reynolds reprised the character in \\"Deadpool 2,\\" which came out in 2018. 2018 was also a milestone year for Reynolds because it was the year he became an American citizen. In 2019, with his career nearly 30 years old, Reynolds continued surprising audiences with his wide assortment of roles. In addition to appearing in Taylor Swift's music video for \\"You Need to Calm Down,\\" he also nabbed an uncredited role in the Dwayne Johnson action movie \\"Fast \\u0026 Furious Presents: Hobbs \\u0026 Shaw\\" (2019).","birthDate":214876800000,"birthplace":"Vancouver","id":"umc.cpc.piy3otwraylpzhddt5knavle","images":{"headshot":{"height":1344,"joeColor":"b:rgb(48,98,142) p:rgb(246,239,242) s:rgb(246,221,207) t:rgb(206,211,222) q:rgb(206,196,194)","supportsLayeredImage":false,"url":"https://is1-ssl.mzstatic.com/image/thumb/AuD8n5TRb16WYCeshVIqKQ/{w}x{h}bb.{f}","width":1344}},"title":"Ryan Reynolds","type":"Person","url":"https://tv.apple.com/us/person/ryan-reynolds/umc.cpc.piy3otwraylpzhddt5knavle","contentTitlesForDescription":["The Proposal","Deadpool","Pokémon Detective Pikachu"],"rolesForDescription":["Actor","Producer","Writer"],"description":"Learn about Ryan Reynolds on Apple TV. </picture> </div>
</div> <div class="person-header__bio"> <h1 class="person-header__bio__title typ-header-emph"> Ryan Reynolds </h1> <div class="line-clamp-wrapper"> <div class="line-clamp line-clamp--with-more person-header__bio__long-notes typ-subhead" style="--link-length:4" dir="auto">
Versatile Canadian-American actor Ryan Reynolds became known for playing a wide variety of roles, from snarky wiseguys in films like "Van Wilder" and "Waiting " to demanding action roles in the comic book movies "Green Lantern" (2011) and "Deadpool" (2016). Born and raised in Vancouver, British Columbia, Reynolds' first professional TV acting job came when he was 15. He was cast on the Canadian teen drama series "Hillside" (YTV/Nickelodeon, 1991-93), which was called "Fifteen" in America, and appeared on 13 episodes of the series. From there Reynolds honed his acting chops by working regularly with TV guest spots, as well as parts in made-for-TV movies like "A Secret Between Friends: A Moment of Truth" (NBC, 1996). Then in 1998 Reynolds nabbed his first big role when he was cast on the sitcom "Two Guys and a Girl" (ABC, 1998-2001). The series ran for four seasons on ABC, and despite a loyal following of fans, was cancelled in 2001 due to low ratings. Despite the cancellation of "Two Guys and a Girl," Reynolds continued landing acting work. He played the title character in the 2002 college comedy "Van Wilder," a foul-mouthed waiter in the 2005 restaurant comedy "Waiting " (2005), and also starred in the 2005 remake of the classic horror film, "The Amityville Horror" (2005). Ever the versatile actor, by the late 2000s Reynolds was earning praise for appearing in a wide variety of film genres, including romantic comedies (2009's "The Proposal"), comic book movies ("The Green Lantern"), and serious dramas (2015's " Woman in Gold"). Having already established himself as an A-lister with the chops to play just about any part, Reynolds' career hit an even higher point in 2016 when he played the wisecracking title character "Deadpool" (2016). "Deadpool" was a huge success at the box office, with Reynolds earning heaps of critical praise for his one-of-a-kind performance. The film was such a success that Reynolds reprised the character in "Deadpool 2," which came out in 2018. 2018 was also a milestone year for Reynolds because it was the year he became an American citizen. In 2019, with his career nearly 30 years old, Reynolds continued surprising audiences with his wide assortment of roles. In addition to appearing in Taylor Swift's music video for "You Need to Calm Down," he also nabbed an uncredited role in the Dwayne Johnson action movie "Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw" (2019).
</div> <button class="line-clamp__more lt-line-clamp__more typography-footnote-emphasized" type="button"> MORE </button> </div> <!---->

<div class="canvas-lockup__content episode-lockup__content"> <div class="typ-footnote clr-secondary-text text-truncate"> SCRUBS · S2, E22 </div> <div class="typ-subhead text-truncate episode-lockup__content__title"> My Dream Job </div> <p class="episode-lockup__description typ-caption clr-secondary-text"> J.D. and Turk's college buddy, Spence, drops by for a visit, and accidentally tells Dr. Cox a secret. Too much partying with successful Spence causes Turk and J.D. to show up late and drunk for work, which Dr. Kelso fully reprehends them for. Elliot's feeling low since she can't measure up to Dr. Kelso's standards, and the Janitor starts another feud – this time over paychecks – with J.D. </p> </div> </div>

<div class="canvas-lockup__content episode-lockup__content"> <div class="typ-footnote clr-secondary-text text-truncate"> TOP GEAR · S18, E3 </div> <div class="typ-subhead text-truncate episode-lockup__content__title"> Episode 3 </div> <p class="episode-lockup__description typ-caption clr-secondary-text"> Jeremy Clarkson and Richard Hammond are on location with the forthcoming Sweeney movie as they take charge of shooting the film's climactic car chase. Clarkson uses his expertise to choreograph the stunt driving while Hammond directs the movie's lead actors, Ray Winstone and Plan B, and organizes an explosive finale. Meanwhile, back at the test track James May casts a suspicious eye over the new Vauxhall Corsa VXR Nurburgring and gives his verdict on the brand new Fiat Panda. Plus, Hollywood actor Ryan Reynolds is the star in the Reasonably Priced Car. </p> </div> </div>
